tgt_original: nabhasi garuḍayāte kiṃ na yānti dvirephāḥ || 1 ||
stimiranikarahantā cakṣurekaṃ prajānām |  avigatamadarāgaḥ sarvathā so'pi supto
aśanavasanahīnā bhāvyamānā virūpā  alamakhilavighātaiḥ pretavaddagdhadehāḥ |  ubhayagativihīnāste'pi nagnāḥ prasuptā
ṛṣaya iha mahānto vatsabhṛgvaṅgirādyāḥ  kratupulahavasiṣṭhā vyāsavālmīkigargāḥ |
tadvanmune kaviśatairapi saṃstutasya  na kṣīyate guṇanidhirguṇasāgarasya || 20 ||
